page.title: 07SCHOOL BELL RINGS AGAIN.
page.content: On Thursday,September 5,1985 at 9 o'clock,when we came to school,the mums did not go home, because the bell was going to be rung for the first time in many many years. It had to be repaired because a long long time ago two brothers stuffed the bell with cow dung so it would not work.The boys were my friend's Grandad and Great Uncle. One of the Dads mended the bell but our teacher is not too sure if the mud they found in the bell was the same cow dung. We invited our parents,the governors of the school and friends to a service to bless the bell and we made up a poem about the bell.We also added our own verse the the hymn,we sang, "Give me chime in my bell,keep me ringing."
